metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5953 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in GNU Wget 1.20.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) or may execute an arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-5953` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wget - 1.19.4-1ubuntu2.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: mdeslaur> actually fixed in 1.20.3, not in 1.20.2

criterions.comment: wget package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.19.4-1ubuntu2.2').
